item.title: 8th Dec 2025 Self Coaching
item.description: Lately I have been reading the book - Great Coaching Questions by Nick Howell and applying the learning layer method as much as I can as taught by Justin Sung to get the most of learning. This is the 2nd layer of learning that I am interleaving this week. And I can find myself making new connections when thinking about the material in the book. In the 1st book , what I hypothesize and consider what the book was all about was all about cognitive flexibility and expanding your vision for greater success.
